reviewText: My mother loves watching these movies during the month of Saint Valentine's Day, and so do I!
Couldn't view a couple of the movies such as All's fair in love and advertising and meddling mom, but I liked the ones I did watch.  Cute story line.

I recently cancelled my cable and was really missing Hallmark movies. These moves are great and the price was right. I love that they are commercial free and the quality of the picture is great. So glad Hallmark has made some of their movies available to the public.
I buy these kind of movies for my special needs adult sister.  She just loves them.
What can I say?  These are some great Hallmark movies, and as I no longer have the Hallmark channel, I love being able to accumulate some of the movies at very reasonable prices.
Excellent
I am very disappointed. for some reason I can not watch these dvd's.  they will not play on my device.
I love all of these movies.  Hallmark is the best.

Fun romantic comedies.  Not horribly sexy, but I still wouldn't keep the kids around.
We were looking for Hallmark Christmas movies & ran across this set of Valentine movies.  Great deal - 4 Hallmark movies at one low price!

If you love the fun Hallmark Holiday Romance movies, then this is for you.  We have mostly watched the Christmas ones, but decided to give this collection a shot.  We were not disappointed.  Nearlyweds was our favorite, but the are all fun and silly just like you would want.
